item.title: Buffets for Iftar are available at 21 on Rajah
item.description:
Source: 21 on Rajah. The buffet. If you’re searching for a venue to hold a corporate Iftar gathering in Singapore during Ramadan, consider the halal-certified 21 On Rajah. Situated within Days Hotel Singapore at Zhongshan Park, this all-day dining restaurant is presenting a selection of Mediterranean and Asian Iftar buffets each evening. Chef de Cuisine Faustino Picardo Ines Jr and his culinary team have crafted diverse menus throughout the week...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/buffets-for-iftar-are-available-at-21-on-rajah/

item.title: Singaporean businesses looking to invest in China can gain a competitive advantage at the recently established Singapore Centre in Guangzhou
item.description:
Source: Ascendas. Companies from Singapore expanding their business into China now have access to a centralized service platform with the recent launch of the Singapore Centre at the Sino-Singapore Guangzhou Knowledge City (SSGKC). Known as Singapore Centre @SSGKC (Singapore Centre), this resource hub is situated within Ascendas OneHub GKC, an all-inclusive business park located within the SSGKC. The Singapore Centre consolidates key agencies and resources from both China and Singapore to offer comprehensive assistance for Singaporean companies investing in China...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singaporean-businesses-looking-to-invest-in-china-can-gain-a-competitive-advantage-at-the-recently-established-singapore-centre-in-guangzhou/

item.title: TripAdvisor has announced the winners of the Travelers' Choice awards for world landmarks
item.description:
TripAdvisor, the popular travel website, has revealed the winners of its Travelersâ€™ Choice awards for top global attractions. Now in their second year, the awards recognized 929 attractions, with a special highlight on the top 25. Asian and Middle Eastern landmarks secured four spots in the global top ten, while an Australian park earned a coveted place among the top ten parks worldwide. Top 10 World Landmarks Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates..
